arts.ttl: Ligue 1 Predictions | Round 10: Nice host Lille and Strasbourg look to bounce back
arts.sum: Ligue 1 Predictions, Round 10 GFFN editor-in-chief Luke Entwistle, and sub-editors Raphaël Jucobin and Bastien Cheval face off in our Ligue 1 predictions competition. This season, GFFN will also be hosting guests. Earlier this season, The Athletic’s Alex Barker participated and became…

Nice are on a strong run of form, winning their last two games, including an impressive victory over Lyon. They are currently unbeaten in their previous four, and a win could take them into the Europe...
